snippet: William George Bonin, whom the media had labeled the Freeway Killer, was executed today, becoming the first California convict to be executed by injection.         Relatives of some of Mr. Bonin's victims celebrated with champagne in a parking lot...
lead_paragraph: William George Bonin, whom the media had labeled the Freeway Killer, was executed today, becoming the first California convict to be executed by injection. Relatives of some of Mr. Bonin's victims celebrated with champagne in a parking lot a few miles from the prison after the execution.

headline.main: Man Known as the Freeway Killer Is Executed
